column5: An ideal get rich quick scheme for you!!  http://www.kijiji.ca/v-fishing-camping-outdoor/barrie/ice-fishing-hut-wall-tent-sauna-workshed-portable-wood-stove/1149505828?enableSearchNavigationFlag=true
I have a buddy that builds them as well..... Wicked little stoves
Ya know if we all chip in a dime or two we could get Chris another length of chimney pipe so his feet could be warm too...  Just Kidding!  Michael
Lots of examples on Youtube.  Go as elaborate or Brockian as you want!  Cheers, Mark
My craftsmanship is much better.    So does that meet the local fire code???
So does that meet the local fire code???  once you cut the side out of tank to let the propane out it's perfectly safe & legal!
once you cut the side out of tank to let the propane out it's perfectly safe & legal!
Ya know if we all chip in a dime or two we could get Chris another length of chimney pipe so his feet could be warm too...  Just Kidding!  Michael :rofl2:
Personally i like the way you situated the cardboard box with the dry kindling nice and close to the opening of the stove...
I bet he could roast his nuts in that hut (Chestnuts, y'know, like roasting on an open fire)
You guys go ahead and have your laughs while I'll be fishing with the ambience of a crackling fire warming my balls.
We're all just jealous of your comfy hut.
When I see the inside of that hut "ambience" is not the first word that  springs to mind, somehow!!
